summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Navigator markdown formatting features. Backend AI service returns properly structured markdown, AiMessage component renders all markdown elements correctly with blue bars, dots, borders. All existing APIs work perfectly. Frontend loads correctly, user registration/login works, navigation to Compliance page successful. AI chat functionality working on both Compliance page and Project Detail page with full markdown rendering.
passed_tests: Backend: All 32 existing API tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend: AI Navigator chat responds with structured markdown
Backend: AI Navigator works with and without project context
Frontend: User registration and login successful
Frontend: Navigation to Compliance page works
Frontend: AI Navigator chat interface functional on Compliance page
Frontend: AI Navigator chat interface functional on Project Detail page
Frontend: H2 headings render with blue bars (5 found on project detail)
Frontend: Bullet points render with blue dots (42 found on project detail)
Frontend: Bold text elements render correctly (33 found on project detail)
Frontend: Blockquotes render with blue left borders (2 found on project detail)
Frontend: Code elements render with primary color styling (7 found on project detail)
Frontend: User messages display in blue pills
Frontend: AI messages display in gray bordered cards
Frontend: Chat container has correct 500px max-height
Frontend: Light theme consistent across all pages
Frontend: State machine and project transitions work correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All core features working, minor timing issues with AI response detection on compliance page)
